channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS

item.title: CVE-2023-23752|2024-07-25T04:33:50.238Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: An issue was discovered in Joomla! 4.0.0 through 4.2.7. An improper access check allows unauthorized access to webservice endpoints.

item.title: CVE-2024-21729|2024-07-25T04:33:58.876Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate input validation leads to XSS vulnerabilities in the accessiblemedia field.

item.title: CVE-2024-21730|2024-07-25T04:33:31.933Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.title: CVE-2024-21730|2024-07-24T04:31:37.451Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: The fancyselect list field layout does not correctly escape inputs, leading to a self-XSS vector.

item.description: The MFA management features did not properly terminate existing user sessions when a user's MFA methods have been modified.
